lines.text: What do you really know about him?
I know that he doesn't wear dentures.

[on answering machine]
Rachel, hi, it's it's Simon. Um, I don't know how long you've got this flat for, but it's nice, so it's okay. I know you don't want to, but we've really got to talk about our house, and fix the price. I've tried calling you at work. Please ring back.
[holds her nose and plunges under the bath water]
